title: Skagboys
author: Welsh, Irvine
snippet: I should have called in at my mother's, and I'mthinking ay daein some ay that gear ah got fae Johnny Swan. Rents mademe agree we should wait a few days and shoot it together, but he'll bestuck on the pish with Begbie now and probably heading for the cells inQueen Charlotte Street or the High Street with that psychotic wretch intow. Now I'm wanting tae get shot ay Coke, but without alienating him,as I need tae maintain the open-house policy.
